tags.name: my-switch
tags.description:
Switches allow the user to toggle an option on or off.

**Slots:**
 - **checked** - Displayed when switch is checked
- **uncheck** - Displayed when switch is unchecked

**Events:**
 - **switchchange** - Emitted whenever the switch is toggled

**CSS Parts:**
 - **control** - Controls the styles of the button element
- **track** - Controls the styles of the track
- **switch** - Controls the styles of the switch

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: This is used to describe the switch

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Indicates if the switch is checked or unchecked
